name: AirHogsLink
description:
Control your favourite Air Hogs from your iOS device!

The Air Hogs Link app works in conjunction with Air Hogs Link, an infrared peripheral that plugs into the headphone jack of your iOS device. Utilizing tilt and joystick touch you can take full control of awesome Air Hogs vehicles!

With exclusive control dashboards for each vehicle, the Air Hogs Link app is Mission Central! Drop the winch with Fly Crane; drive, fly, and fire missiles with Hover Assault; or unleash a fury of disks with Saw Blade! Just enter the Air Hogs Hangar, select your vehicle, and you’re ready for take-off!

Version 1.0 of the Air Hogs Link app is compatible with:
- Hover Assault
- Sharpshooter
- Havoc
- Heli Cage
- Heli Replay
- Fly Crane
- MORE TO COME!

With the app you can also check out videos, link in with Air Hogs fans through Facebook and Twitter, and learn more about Air Hogs!

For more product and purchasing information please visit us at: http://www.airhogs.com
